This stone fragment from the _Third Seal_ retains a tiny sliver of that legendary item's power. The shard sheds light constantly, with the effects of a [torch](/Equipment.aspx?ID=60) requiring no oxygen and generating no heat. The flame can be covered or hidden, but it can't be smothered or quenched.
